title: France Eliminates Team USA From the FIBA World Cup. What Now? | Group Chat
description:
We gather for an emergency reaction to Team USA losing in international tournament play for the first time in 58 games. What comes next for USA basketball: Will they have to go young with Zion Williamson and Trae Young, or will veteran stars like LeBron James, James Harden, Anthony Davis, and more reenter the fold?

Hosts: Justin Verrier and Dan Devine

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
